next_state: -= Kitchen =- Ah, the kitchen. This is some kind of kitchen, really great ordinary vibes in this place, a wonderful ordinary atmosphere. And now, well, you're in it. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call "looking." You can see a fridge. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! The fridge contains a white onion. You shudder, but continue examining the room. You can make out an oven. Hmm. You always thought you'd be more excited to see an oven in a room. You see a table. I guess it's true what they say, if you're looking for a table, go to TextWorld. The table is massive. On the table you make out a cookbook and a knife. You can see a counter. You see a red apple, a roasted green apple, a green hot pepper, a red onion and a raw yellow potato on the counter. You can see a stove. But the thing is empty, unfortunately. There is an open plain door leading east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, there is no door. > -= Kitchen =-0/8

admissible_commands: take green hot pepper from counter
